comment.author: 10789832@N00
comment._content:
I believe this is Escoe Glandon with wife Louetta Nelson Glandon and children: Carl, Earl, and Marie.
Eulas Escoe Glandon, born 14 May1895; died 25 Apr 1982
Louetta Nelson Glandon, born 30 Oct 1898; died 24 Oct 1975
Carl Glandon, born about 1923
Earl Glandon, born 14 May 1924; died 25 Apr 1970
Marie Glandon, born about 1927
